entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
